attributes.action: Reward NHS workers with £500, the same as Scotland has.
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is a treasure of the UK, despite years of chronic under-funding from the Tories. The pressures they've dealt with this year have been appaling and they've worked their way through. Nurses, Doctors, Porters, everyone. The very least, the VERY least we can do is to help them with a little extra cash this Christmas. Pay them with money, not claps at the doorstep.
attributes.background: Scottish NHS workers have received a £500 thank-you payment as some recompense for all their additional work and stress this year. British NHS workers have received either nothing, or a trivial amount. The government should at least match Scotland's payment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Give NHS staff a one off bonus for their help with Covid 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321150

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495

Government to match the £500 bonus to all care staff: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320495
